amendment.description: Amendment establishes the Foreign Threat Response Center, comprised of analysts from all elements of the intelligence community, to provide comprehensive assessment of foreign efforts to influence United States' political processes and elections by the Governments of Russia, Iran, North Korea, China, and any other foreign country the Director determines appropriate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to establish the Foreign Threat Response Center, comprised of analysts from all elements of the intelligence community, to provide comprehensive assessment of foreign efforts to influence United States' political processes and elections by the Governments of Russia, Iran, North Korea, China, and any other foreign country the Director determines appropriate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 196 (Roll no. 491).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kennedy amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 196 (Roll no. 491).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Kennedy.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
